title: 6 - Stay Sixy
description: For their first themed episode, Karen and Georgia discuss children who kill their parents, featuring Alex & Derek King and Jasmine Richardson. The ladies also discuss TV shows The People vs. OJ and Autopsy, and read listener hometown murders.
